dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5422 IH: Small Business Working Group Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Williams of Texas (for himself and Mrs. Beatty) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To require FinCEN to establish a small business working group, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Small Business Working Group Act.

subsection.text: Section 310(g)(5)(A) of title 31, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in clause (vi) by striking and at the end;
in clause (vii) by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by inserting the following at the end:

clause.text: each year, hold a small business working group to—

subclause.text: share information about the effectiveness of beneficial ownership information;
promote coordination between FinCEN and the small business community; and
and provide guidance to small businesses about beneficial ownership reporting obligations.

subsection.text: No additional amounts may be appropriated to carry out the amendments made by subsection (a).
